featured.text: All the flights to and from Kaohsiung were _____ because of the heavy thunderstorm.

definition.zh_def: 雷陣雨：伴隨雷聲和閃電的強烈降雨。
definition.en_def: A thunderstorm is a rain-bearing cloud that also produces lightning and thunder.
definition.example: We stayed indoors during the thunderstorm to stay safe from the lightning.
